body_content.explanation: the same as or equal to someone or something:
examples: The regeneration of the city's downtown dock front will put it on a par with Nice or Cannes.

body_content.explanation: the expected number of times in golf that a good player should have to hit the ball in order to get it into a hole or into all the holes:
examples: Tiger Woods finished the round 10 below/under par.

body_content.explanation: the original value of a share, bond, etc. when it is made available for sale for the first time:
examples: Clients will be entitled to borrow 100 percent of the par value of their securities at a low interest rate.
